response.overview: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feed his urge for violent action.
response.tagline: On every street in every city, there's a nobody who dreams of being a somebody.
response.title: Taxi Driver
